Column Comment.0: UNIQUE WELL IDENTIFIER: A unique name, code or number designated as theprimary key for this row.
Column Comment.1: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.2: ANALYSIS OBSERVATION NUMBER: Number assigned by the analyzing labuniquely identifying the sieve analysis.
Column Comment.3: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.4: ANALYSIS DATE: Date the sieve analysis was performed.
Column Comment.5: BASE DEPTH: Measured depth from the surface to the bottom of the interval forsieve analysis.
Column Comment.6: BASE DEPTH OUOM: Base measured depth original unit of measure.
Column Comment.7: EFFECTIVE DATE: The date that the data in this row first came into effect.
Column Comment.8: EXPIRY DATE: The date that the data in this row was no longer active or in effect.
Column Comment.9: INTERVAL DEPTH: Measured depth from the surface to the point where the samplewas collected for analysis.
Column Comment.10: INTERVAL DEPTH OUOM: Sample interval depth original unit of measure.
Column Comment.11: INTERVAL LENGTH: Value for the length of the interval sampled for sieve analysis.
Column Comment.12: INTERVAL LENGTH OUOM: Interval length original unit of measure.
Column Comment.13: BUSINESS ASSOCIATE: Unique identifier for a business associate, such as aperson, company, regulatory agency, government or consortium.
Column Comment.14: LABORATORY FILE NUMBER: Number assigned to the sieve analysis by thelaboratory.
Column Comment.15: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.16: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.17: TOP DEPTH: Measured depth from the surface to the top of the interval for sieveanalysis.
Column Comment.18: TOP DEPTH OUOM: Top measured depth original unit of measure.
Column Comment.19: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.20: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.21: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.22: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.23: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.24: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.25: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
